summary: This review discusses how directed evolution can be used to diversify carotenoid biosynthetic pathways in organisms like E. coli, providing insights into the natural evolution of metabolic pathways.
key_claims: Directed evolution experiments can generate new natural product analogs by evolving carotenoid biosynthetic pathways.
